Name: Pagans Must Die
About the game: A fanatic of a fictional Christian heresy has a bloody past. Can he find redemption? Become a better person? That's up to you: don't kill anybody or kill everybody and see the story unfold. Key Features Interactive dialog: some options will lead to physical confrontations while others to a pacific resolution. Spare the life of your opponents or kill them: the choice is yours(It can affect the story). Dynamic party: depending on your choices you might end up with different companions, or even alone. Classic turn based combat. 4 different endings: bad ending, pagan ending, christian ending and evil ending. Hand drawn 2d graphics. Native 2K and 4k sprites and backgrounds. 21:9 support. Two quick save slots with f5, f6(yeah, I hate when pc games don't have them, lol).
